sn32.57:1.2: Ekamantam nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn32.57:1.3: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo, yenekada devo vassati”ti?
sn32.57:1.6: ‘yannuna mayam sakaya ratiya vaseyyama’ti, tesam tam cetopanidhimanvaya devo vassati.
sn32.57:1.7: Ayam kho, bhikkhu, hetu, ayam paccayo, yenekada devo vassati”ti.
